distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for tar fixes the following issues:

- Fix the POINTYFEATHER vulnerability - GNU tar archiver can be tricked into extracting
  files and directories in the given destination, regardless of the
  path name(s) specified on the command line [bsc#1007188]
  [CVE-2016-6321]
- Fix Amanda integration issue (bsc#913058)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Directory traversal vulnerability in the safer_name_suffix function in GNU tar 1.14 through 1.29 might allow remote attackers to bypass an intended protection mechanism and write to arbitrary files via vectors related to improper sanitization of the file_name parameter, aka POINTYFEATHER.
notes.title: CVE description
